MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G11 postcode area of Glasgow, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:57am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at Partickhill Avenue substation and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00am. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:00 AM on Monday, 07 December 2020.
